Name: Marny Cocktail
Ingredients: 25 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: STIR (or shake) all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: Originally shaken but perhaps better stirred. Simple but no less tasty for it.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Harry Craddock's 1930 The Savoy Cocktail Book .
Nutrition: One serving of Marny Cocktail contains 173 calories
